string.name: name
string.value: [Hunt] Why Are Dark Stumps So Dark?
#b#@1032101:##k in #b#m101000000##k says she has a favor to ask you.
She wants you to eliminated 40 #rDark Stumps#k that are emitting foul odor.\n\nReport back to #b#@1032101:##k in #b#m101000000##k upon completion.
You have eliminated 40 #rDark Stumps#k that were emitting foul odor.
Hiya! You seem like you're in the middle of an adventure.\nWon't you help me? It's something really easy to do.
Have you ever smelled something rotting in the forest? No?\nYour senses must be dull. I'm the opposite, though. I'm overly sensitive, and that rotting smell has been killing me!

Anyway, that rotting smell comes from #rDark Stumps#k.\nAnd I was wondering if you could eliminate 40 #rDark Stumps#k to clear the air a little. I would have a much easier time breathing the air if you do that for me. You'll find a lot of them in either #b#m100040000##k or #b#m101010102##k.
Hmpf! You're not going to even hear me out?

You're back!
Eww, you reek!
I can already tell how hard you had to work to eliminate those monsters.

You must have caught a lot of them!

Now, I'll be able to breathe in clean, aromatic air when I pass by the forest.
And it is all because of you. Thanks!

Don't forget to take a bath!
